multiplechoiceresponse.p:
Consider this colloquial (common) statement:
"Rocks are not a good source of cooking oil"
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which one of the following is the proper translation of the above statement into standard E form

choicegroup.choice: No rocks are a good source of cooking oil
No rocks are things that are a good source of cooking oil
No rocks are things and no rocks are a good source of cooking oil
Some rocks are not things that are a good source of cooking oil
